speedTest.title: Internet Speed Test
speedTest.subtitle: Measure your connection's ping, download, and upload speeds with precision and real-time feedback
speedTest.pingDescription: Measures round-trip time to our servers using multiple requests and calculates median latency for accuracy.
speedTest.downloadDescription: Downloads a 10MB file and measures the time to calculate your download speed in real-time with streaming.
speedTest.uploadDescription: Uploads a 5MB file to measure your upload speed and connection stability for comprehensive testing.
